trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all chart element collections.
Removes all elements from the <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref>.
Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
`True` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `False` to release only unmanaged resources.
Inserts an element into the <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref> at the specified index location.
The zero-based index location of the item will be inserted.
The object to insert.
The value can be `null` for reference types.
Forces the invalidation of the parent chart element.
Removes the element at the specified index location of the <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref>.
The zero-based index location of the element to remove.
Resumes the invalidation of a chart element in the collection.

If you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A> method several times, you will need to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.ResumeUpdates%2A> method an equal number of times.
Replaces the element at the specified index location.
The zero-based index location of the element to replace.
The new value for the element at the specified index location.
The value can be `null` for reference types.
Suspends the invalidation of a chart element in the collection.

A call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.Invalidate%2A> method will have no effect after the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A> method is called.

If you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.SuspendUpdates%2A> method several times, you will need to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection%601.ResumeUpdates%2A> method an equal number of times.
